title: Page Turners from Your Local Library Revealed
text:
(MENAFN Press) 



The Girl on the Train and Alert most borrowed eBooks and audiobooks 


OverDrive the leading eBook and audiobook platform for libraries and schools announced the most borrowed digital books from public libraries for August 2015. Paula Hawkins' The Girl on the Train continues to dominate the top spot as the most popular eBook and audiobook title borrowed from the library. Released August 3 James Patterson's mystery-thriller Alert was the most popular new release eBook and audiobook while Sue Grafton's much anticipated X made a strong push in the last week of August. See the top five most borrowed digital books from OverDrive-powered libraries last month below. 

The most borrowed eBooks and Audiobooks from libraries list is based on data from 34000 libraries and schools worldwide that lend eBooks audiobooks and other digital media via the OverDrive platform. In August more than 15 million digital titles were borrowed from libraries across the globe. To borrow and read these popular titles and more from your local library get started at OverDrive.com 

TOP 5 MOST BORROWED EBOOK TITLES FROM LIBRARIES IN AUGUST 

1. The Girl on the Train by Paula Hawkins (Penguin Publishing Group) 
2. All The Light We Cannot See by Anthony Doerr (Scribner) 
3. Go Set a Watchman by Harper Lee (HarperCollins) 
4 . Gone Girl by Gillian Flynn (Crown/Archetype) 
5. Grey by E.L. James (Knopf Doubleday Publishing Group) 

TOP 5 MOST BORROWED AUDIOBOOK TITLES FROM LIBRARIES IN AUGUST 

1. The Girl on the Train by Paula Hawkins (Books on Tape) 
2. Gone Girl by Gillian Flynn (Penguin Random House Audio Publishing Group) 
3. Go Set a Watchman by Harper Lee (HarperCollins) 
4. All The Light We Cannot See by Anthony Doerr (Simon & Schuster Audio) 
5. The Hunger Games by Suzanne Collins (Scholastic Audio) 

TOP 5 NEW EBOOK RELEASES FROM LIBRARIES IN AUGUST 

1. Alert by James Patterson (Little Brown and Company) - released 8/3 
2. Silver Linings by Debbie Macomber (Random House Publishing Group) - released 8/11 
3. Who Do You Love by Jennifer Weiner (Atria Books) - released 8/11 
4. The Marriage of Opposites by Alice Hoffman (Simon & Schuster) - released 8/4 
5. X by Sue Grafton (Penguin Publishing Group) - released 8/25 

TOP 5 NEW AUDIOBOOK RELEASES FROM LIBRARIES IN AUGUST 

1. Alert by James Patterson (Blackstone Audio Inc.) - released 8/3 
2. X by Sue Grafton (Penguin Random House Audio Publishing Group) - released 8/25 
3. Silver Linings by Debbie Macomber (Penguin Random House Audio Publishing Group) - released 8/11 
4. The Murderer's Daughter by Jonathan Kellerman (Penguin Random House Audio Publishing Group) - released 8/18 
5. Friction by Sandra Brown (Blackstone Audio Ind.) - released 8/18 


About OverDrive 

OverDrive is the leading global digital distribution platform supplying the industry's largest catalog of eBooks audiobooks periodicals and streaming video to 34000 libraries schools and retailers worldwide. We support all major computers and devices including iPhone® iPad® Nook® Android™ phones and tablets Chromebook™ and Kindle® (U.S. only).
